name: Space Fleet 3D
description:
Welcome to the space...

Do you like to fly through the endless space and stay safe from the astroids ? Then this is the perfect game for you. Just start your journey by clicking on the 'Get' button on the App Store. 

In this game, you need to dodge all those astroids coming in your way and score points. You can select any ship you like and start your journey through space. 

Happy Journey
